## How to view and update my profile?

Learners’ profiles include their personal information, e-portfolios, and
achievements. Andy wants to view his profile and update the profile. Now let’s
see how Andy will view and update the profile.

#### View and update the personal information

Andy wants to view and update his personal information. Now let’s see how Andy
will view and edit the personal information in the profile.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **My profile** on the left navigation pane. He
can see the personal information.

***Note** : Andy can also click his photo in the upper-right corner and click
**My profile** to access the **Personal information** page.

2\. He clicks **Edit**.

3\. In the **Edit my profile** panel, Andy uploads the personal image and
enters a few words about himself in the **About me** field.

4\. When he finishes the updates, he clicks **Save**.

#### Create projects in the e-portfolio

Andy wants to create a project to share his learning outcomes and assignments
with his trainers. Now let’s see how Andy will create a project in the
e-portfolio.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **My profile** on the left navigation pane, and
then clicks **E-portfolio**. He can see all projects that he has created.

2\. He clicks **Create project**.

3\. Andy fills in the project information and add the project content. He can
upload files from his local device or add assignments from his courses.

4\. He can click **Preview** to preview the project content.

5\. When Andy finishes the configuration for the project, he clicks **Save**.
The trainers will see the project in his e-portfolio if Andy shares his
profile with them.

***Note** : If he wants to publish the project later or doesn’t want others to
view this project, he can click **Save as private**.

#### View achievements and upload certificates for completed courses

When learners complete courses in Curricula, they obtain achievements to
upskill themselves. Andy has completed all learning activities for the course
"Certified Quality Engineer" and he wants to upload his certificate for the
course. Now let’s see how Andy will upload a certificate.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **My profile** on the left navigation pane, and
then clicks **Achievement**. He can see all courses that he has completed.

2\. He locates the certificate for the course "Certified Quality Engineer",
and then clicks the image.

3\. Andy clicks **Upload an image** and select an image from his local device.

4\. When he finishes uploading the image, he clicks **Save**.

#### What if Andy wants to share his profile with the users in specific
courses?

By default, all staff and learners in the same organisation have permissions
to access a learner’s profile. Andy wants to share his profile with the users
in the course "Certified Quality Engineer" only. Now let’s see how Andy will
configure the profile sharing.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **My profile** on the left navigation pane, and
then clicks **Profile sharing**.

2\. In the **Profile sharing** panel, he selects **Users in specific courses**
and selects the course "Certified Quality Engineer". The staff and learners in
the course will be able to see his profile.
